Name: Crystal of Soul
Desc:
Imitates the power of Crystal and generates Crystal of Soul. Crystal of the Soul can activate a reaction skill.
The down key can use up all the crystal shards and place a Crystal of the Soul at once. Lock the command to use the skill key without the direction keys to consume all of your Crystal Fragments and place Crystals of Soul at once.
Craft: Javelin does not consume attackable enemy count.
Can't be used during Glory Wing.
Required Skill: Reaction: Destruction II Lv. 1 or higher and Reaction: Domination II Lv. 1 or higher
Command Lock: Right-click
